title: Banned for nothing
body: So for some reason this game is for children which explains why girl champions are sexually implicit anyways so like i find it so lame that riot keeps making skins for yasou and jinx and they don't even make a skin for fucking sion. And whats so funny is instead of updating udyrs garbage player model from like the birth of LoL they just made another $15 skin with upgraded visuals Lmao fuck you riot.

replies.body:
How does the title have anything to do with this post
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
I dont think you know what half those words mean, but i can see why you got banned.

ppl always like to point out how oversexualized females are in video games...

AT LEAST ITS BETTER THAN THE SHIT 4KIDS DID WITH ANIMES!

if you ever watched the shit 4kids "censored" in pokemon yugioh etc... oh boy. id rather have that oversexualized female than this censored shit.
I too am having a stroke.
